headline: Citi upgrades Invitation Homes, downgrades American Homes 4 Rent on valuation gap
summary: Investing.com --Citi upgraded Invitation Homes (NYSE:INVH) to Buy and downgraded American Homes (NYSE:AMH) 4 Rent to Neutral, citing relative valuation and expectations that Invitation Homes’ earnings growth will soon catch up with its peer.

content.title: Citi upgrades Invitation Homes, downgrades American Homes 4 Rent on valuation gap
